meaningMnemonic: Taking <radical>orders</radical> from a <radical>geoduck</radical> will place you into enemy <kanji>territory</kanji>. Geoducks make terrible commanders, so if you take orders from one, expect to end up in unknown territory, potentially even enemy territory. Be prepared.
readingMnemonic: Not wanting to end up dead in enemy <kanji>territory</kanji>, you decide to escape this geoduck leader by getting on a <reading>row</reading> (りょう) boat and rowing your way outta there. The geoduck commander orders you to halt your escape, but you still get in your row boat and row away.
